channel.title: Manan Patel on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Manan Patel on Home

item.title: MINIJAVA COMPILER DESIGN (JAVA ON ECLIPSE)
item.description: Coded Lexical Analysis, Parser, Semantic Analysis, and Back End Translation for MiniJava Optimized it for a better performance

item.title: VIDEO SHOP APPLICATION (JAVA ON ECLIPSE)
item.description: Wrote an object-oriented program that simulates a rental video shop functionality Created the framework with the goal of being able to update the app without affecting the app Used multiple patterns such as command pattern, factory pattern, and builder pattern

item.title: TASK MANAGEMENT WEB APPLICATION (FRAMER)
item.description: Designed a working prototype for task management with peer-evaluation functionalities Designed a relational database for storing user information Used Agile methodology to manage the project

item.title: TETRIS (C# ON VISUAL STUDIOS)
item.description: Designed and implemented a version of the game Tetris Followed the partitioning pattern in a Global Software Development environment Performed unit tests to check the correctness of the methods

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: I would love to connect with you. Please feel free to contact me. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
